trans-unit.source: A helper class that provides information about the browser environment in which a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] application is hosted.
Returns a reference to an object that can be used to access the host browser via its OLE container interfaces (for example, IOleClientSite::GetContainer();).
An object that can be cast to <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.OLE.Interop.IOleClientSite>.

Gets a script object that provides access to the HTML window object, custom script functions, and global variables for the HTML page, if the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] is hosted in a frame.
With the returned HostScript object, you can access the properties, methods, and events of the HTML window object, call a script function directly, or access a global variable.
The syntax to access these items uses the familiar dot notation.
For more information about the window object, see [window object](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=160274) in the Dynamic HTML (DHTML) documentation.
The HostScript property returns `null` if the frame is navigated to from a cross-domain location.
This feature can be turned off for Internet Explorer by setting the **ScriptInteropDisallow** registry value.

A script object that provides access to the HTML window object, custom script functions, and global variables for the HTML page, if the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] is hosted in a frame; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that specifies whether the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] application is browser hosted.

A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> can be host agnostic and, consequently, can be loaded into several different types of hosts, including a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, or a browser.

This can happen when you have a library assembly that contains one or more pages, and which is referenced by multiple standalone and browsable ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]) host applications.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the application is browser hosted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the location from which a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] application was launched.
The Source property contains only a <xref:System.Uri> for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] applications.
For an example of the Source property, see <xref:System.Windows.Interop.BrowserInteropHelper.IsBrowserHosted%2A>.

The <xref:System.Uri> for the location from which a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] application was launched; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
